extendedInfo.description: It's always time to tailgate! And with the UPDATED Tailgate Fan app, everything you need to make your tailgate great is right at your foam-fingertips. Need an awesome new recipe to shake up your tailgating feast? TFâs got it. Want to create funny photos and share them with your friends? TFâs got that. Want to participate in contests to win awesome prizes? Oh yeah, TFâs got that too. Download Tailgate Fan today and let the tailgating fun begin! Features â¢ Fun photo tool â Add a beer helmet or put your head - or a friend's - on the bodies of the craziest tailgaters out there â¢ Tailgating recipes â check out recipes and photos of the best tailgating grub â¢ Contests â win great prizes throughout the season with photo contests and in-app games â¢ And more - get inspired by photos and videos of other tailgates in your area and across the country. Submit your own photos to show off your setup!

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: I thought this app would help plan tailgates, but all it does is show local tailgates. It didn\'t even have my area as an option. Completely useless app. Plus, access is requested for Facebook before you can even start the app... seems shady.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wants to connect to Facebook, can\'t use otherwise
reviews.comment: I\'m suspicious. No instructions or anything, it won\'t let me do anything without connecting to Facebook. Since the description doesn\'t mention that, and also is a bit vague on how it does anything, I uninstalled it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Better than the old version. :)  Go Giants!!
reviews.author: A Google User
